column7: Can confirm. We have visual on telemetry from satalites 61/65 and 103
column11: Go home and hug our loved ones - That's all that we can do
column13: We can use a shuttle packed with the largest nuclear warheads we can get in time and hope we can disintegrate it before it arrives.
column15: Will it work? Chances of success?
column19: Approved. I'll prepare to address the nation
column23: Jordan - You will be in charge of navigation when we launch
column27: Yes - we need our best on this.
